result:
Welcome to the Ethereum Foundation (Stiftung Ethereum), the non-profit institution which sole purpose is to serves the Ethereum ecosystem! This website serves as a simple intro into the organization, its mechanisms and people behind it.

Mission

The Ethereum Foundationâ€™s mission is to promote and support Ethereum platform and base layer research, development and education to bring decentralized protocols and tools to the world that empower developers to produce next generation decentralized applications (dapps), and together build a more globally accessible, more free and more trustworthy Internet.

Things we do

At the EF mainly focused on fundamental research, development of new Ethereum clients, Smart contract languages and the necessary tooling for dapp developers. Part of the job is advocating for the decentralized technology outside of the blockchain community to help to bridge the adoption gap. We also organize an annual developer focused conference called the Ethereum Devcon.
